job.title: Senior Digital Marketing Manager
job.description: ltpgtquimbee is growing were looking for a fulltime senior digital marketing manager to join our core team ltstronggtthis position is remoteltstronggt quimbee is fully remote and distributed this role is permanently remote like all jobs at quimbee all you need is an internet connection and a quiet place to workltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtoverviewltstronggtltpgtltpgtquimbee has a massive library of digital content designed to help law students and attorneys succeed every step of the way we believe the foundation of all marketing is a great product and we have a team of brilliant content creators designers developers and more to make that happen now we need you to help us spread the word far and wide grow our audience and convert more prospective customers to lifelong subscribersltpgtltpgtin this role youll own our digital marketing strategy you will help set the vision and outline the kpis and success metrics well track to grade our efforts youll execute our digital marketing strategy which will include paid marketing seosem email marketing content marketing and more but you wont do it alone youll work with our content design and marketing teams to develop assets and marketing materials as well as liaise with our internal and external marketing contributors staff authorcontent creator cro manager payperclick campaign managerconsultant seo consultant and others as needed to hone our efforts youll bring your analytical skills to bear analyzing our data and evaluating what works and what doesntltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtdevelop overall digital marketing strategy as well as our brand voice in consultation with the ceo coo and marketing teamltligtltligtset and track kpis and success metrics to ensure our digital marketing efforts are delivering roiltligtltligtplan and execute all digital marketing campaigns in consultation with our internal and external team members consultants and stakeholdersltligtltligtcollaborate with our content design and marketing teams to develop assets and marketing collateralltligtltligtcraft highly effective copy for our marketing campaigns and onsite copy in collaboration with our content and product teamsltligtltligtplan and execute our emailmarketing strategy in collaboration with our content and product teams focusing not only on conversion but retention and npsltligtltligtliaise with our payperclick campaign manager to ensure our ads are highly effective at the best possible cpaltligtltligtcollaborate with our seosem consultant to ensure our website is highly performant and technically sound and our content strategy will help us rank in search engines for our most important key wordsltligtltligtdesign and maintain our social media effortltligtltligtwork closely with our cro manager to help ideate and assess possible experiments to improve our conversion rateltligtltligtexperiment ab test and analyze our data to optimize our marketing efforts and ensure our time and money are being invested where they are most effectiveltligtltligtidentify potential new marketing channels pilot efforts and report resultsltligtltligtsource and manage external consultants and agencies as needed to grow our marketing strategyltligtltligtreport results to key stakeholders to bring them along and keep them invested in our marketing effortsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtwho you areltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtltemgtpassionate about digital marketingltemgtampnbspyou live eat and breathe digital marketing youre a pro at paid digital marketing email marketing seosem cro social and more you stay up to date with the latest trends and youre always eager to learn moreltligtltligtltemgta creative marketerltemgt you think outside the box and come up with compelling copy and campaigns that will get attention and make people want to learn moreltligtltligtltemgtan analytical thinkerltemgtampnbspyou understand data and believe in making datadriven decisions you dont expend effort or money just anywhere you are laser focused on driving roiltligtltligtltemgta detailoriented techsavvy selfstarterltemgt youre comfortable with technology generally and eager to learn you have expertlevel proficiency in adobes suite of design essentials especially illustrator and keynote youre disciplined and motivated the kind of person who doesnt need someone looking over your shoulder to make sure youre doing your jobltligtltligtltemgtan excellent team playerltemgt you communicate clearly effectively and politely with your teammates in fact you believe in overcommunicating because you understand that lack of communication is the root cause of a dysfunctional team you thrive on crossfunctional teams with colleagues who have different areas of expertiseltligtltligtltemgta fun personltemgt you dont lose your cool you bring out the best in the people around you you dont take yourself too seriously you can make and take a jokeltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtrequirementsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtbachelors or masters degree in marketing or a related fieldltligtltligtminimum years experience in digital marketing experience in the online education or legal industries a plus but not requiredltligtltligtdemonstrable expertise in ppc marketing seosem and email marketingltligtltligtworking knowledge of cro ab testing and multivariate experimentsltligtltligtexperience with email and marketingautomation platforms eg customerio intercom as well as website and marketinganalytics tools eg google analytics semrush etcltligtltligtfamiliarity with digital ad networks and major search engineltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtbenefitsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtexpected salary compensation is commiserate on skills and qualifications but can be expected to fall within per yearltligtltligt remote thats one of the biggies no more commuteltligtltligtprofit share we set aside a percentage of profits each year and then pay them out equally across the entire teamltligtltligtgroup healthinsurance coverage as well as dental vision life and short and long term disability optionsltligtltligtk matching up to matching up to and between and ltligtltligtunlimited paid time off our philosophy is that if you feel you need time off for example because of overwork sickness personal matters etc were not going to question that we just ask that you dont abuse it and that you give us at least two weeks notice if you plan to be awayltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
